description:
Asia Argento is a nun with blonde hair who owns a set of Sacred Gear rings called Twilight Healing.  As the second main heroine of the series, she serves as the bishop on Rias`s team. Raised by the church, she attracts people seeking healing, however, after they discover that she can heal devils, she is considered a heretic. When she moves to Issei`s area, she befriends Issei, but is abducted by the fallen angels who steal her rings and kill her. Rias revives her to become a devil using her Bishop piece.She moves into the Hyodo residence and transfers to their school. Despite her devil identity, Asia tries to continue her faith, although whenever she prays or reads the Bible, she gets a severe headache.
Asia is strongly attracted to Issei as her first friend; she is jealous whenever he acts perverted towards the other girls, asking that he redirect his actions towards her. She is willing to disrobe if that helps her become closer to him, which makes Issei conflicted between wanting to protect her innocence and indulging in her desires.
Asia`s familiar is a baby Sprite Dragon named Rassei. She later makes a pact with Dragon King Fafnir,after the latter broke his contract with Azazel, to become a Dragon User. Following Rias and Akeno`s graduation, she becomes the next President of the Occult Research Club.
Source: Wikipedia
